text:
Watching the great @holly_cummins at #KubeCon talking about wasted resources and efficiency.  Can't help but think in the @VMware world these are almost all solved problems at the IaaS layer that now should be exposed to #Kubernetes cluster, not re-solved !

@VMwareTanzuUK

author.description: Traveller. VMware EMEA Technical Leadership. Cloud Evangelist, Consultant, sailor, skiier and Robot Wars World Champion. All tweets my own
author.name: Ed Hoppitt
